problem.markdown:
1. name = input("enter your name")  
2. print(name, "your score is", score)  
3. score = 199

Order the above numbered code lines into the proper sequence

( ) 1, 2, 3 ( ) 2, 3, 1 (x) 3, 1, 2 ( ) 3, 2, 1
